job_title: (Senior) Buyers / Purchasers - Procurement Operation x 6 openings
description:
Our client is a sizable company. Due to the rapid growth of the company, they are now looking for talented individuals to join the professional team.

The Role:

Maintain up-to-date commercial and contractual knowledge of the market place and methods to ensure that best practices are continually developed and utilized within the group
Manage completed Purchasing cycles
Coordinate Purchase requisitions from business, advise requestor on sourcing channel and execute tactical sourcing as needed.
Maintain the contract repository (upload and archive contracts as needed)
Review contract compliance and contracts due for renewal
Support complication of procurement operations / performance reports
The Job;

Diploma or University graduate or professional qualification in a related discipline
3+ years' relevant experience in purchasing in ICT or Tech products and service, Common computer software and office supplies
hands-on experience in Procurement operations experience is essential
Working experience in regulatory requirements and procurement policies
Ability to inspire, and build trust and respect among the stakeholders
Excellent people skills; including the ability to negotiate and influence internal and external stakeholders
A team player, assertive yet approachable and decisive
proficiency in Excel (V-lookup, macros) and PowerPoint Presentation and procurement systems

job_title: Purchasing Officer / Senior Purchasing Assistant (3 Vacancies - Tsimshatsui / Kwai Chung)
description:
Our client is an US Sourcing Office with 300+ stores. As of business expansion, they are now looking for a Senior Merchandiser to support end to end product development to sourcing functions. 

Job Description:

Source vendors and develop products according to the objectives and requirements from the buying team
Monitor day to day operation including supplier management, product development, quote sheets, sample verification & order follow up
Responsible for payment terms negotiation and vendor set up, on time shipment & Critical Path management
Maintain vendor relationship and KPI measurements
Liaise with buyers and vendors to ensure programs are delivered on time and as planned
Coordinate the sourcing activates with various department such as QA, Supply chain and packaging team
Ability to manage a team of 1-2 junior sourcing specialist and/or sourcing assistant

Experience

Degree holder or Higher Diploma in any discipline
6+ years of experience in any hardgood categories (Seasonal, General Merchandise, Arts & Crafts, Stationery, etc.) 
Familiar with sourcing landscape across Asia
selling_points: Dip/Degree in Purchasing & Supply Chain Management
2-5 yrs exp in merchandising or purchasing field
Experience in handling office supplies items
